subject: delivery of Order #SSN4388
description_text:
Hello,
4th of December i have created Order #SSN4388 and till this day i have not
received any information about shipping. I have paid extra for early
shipping and it was not yet shipped.

Can i kindly ask you when i can expect my order delivery?




BR

Miroslav Havelka

conversations.body_text: Hi Miroslav Havelka,    We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund your additional shipping fees.

Hello, thank you for the information, so pedals should arrive next week as
you will restock them this week?



Miroslav
---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
Yes, thank you for your understanding.

Hello, can i expect the delivery to be done this week ? The order is still
in "confirmed" state.



Thank you
---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
